name: In the MATTER OF DISCIPLINE OF Glenn D. DESANTIS.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the MATTER OF DISCIPLINE OF Glenn D. DESANTIS.
casebody.head_matter:
In the MATTER OF DISCIPLINE OF Glenn D. DESANTIS.
No. D-3061
Supreme Court of the United States.
Feb. 24, 2020
Glenn D. DeSantis, of Voorhees, New Jersey, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
